it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.actions.atoms

Class RevengeAtom

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.actions.atoms.AtomBase
      • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.actions.atoms.AtomContext
        • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.actions.atoms.RevengeAtom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtomEffectContext, AtomicAction, EffectContext

    public class RevengeAtom
extends AtomContext
    Atom representing an atomic REVENGE action. This is not strictly detailed in the game's rules, but it fits nicely with the other atoms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RevengeAtom(AtomsContainer parent, Player attacker)
      Builds a new atom bound to the given aware of the Player that it needs to take revenge from

    • Method Summary

      Player getAttacker()
      Returns the player that triggered this context, or null if this context is not damage-taken triggered.
